context:
EN :
Night in the Backstreets
JP :
裏路地の夜

EN :
Turn Start: gain 1 [Enhancement], 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease], and 1 [Vulnerable]
JP :
ターン開始時、[Enhancement]1, [TakeHpHealIncrease]1, [Vulnerable]1を得る

EN :
Turn Start: gain 2 [Enhancement], 2 [TakeHpHealIncrease], and 1 [Vulnerable]
JP :
ターン開始時、[Enhancement]2, [TakeHpHealIncrease]2, [Vulnerable]1を得る

original: 자신의 속도가 대상보다 빠르거나 일방 공격을 할 경우, 대상에게 피해량 +10%
context:
EN :
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +10% more damage against the target
JP :
自分の速度が対象より高いか一方攻撃をするとき、対象へダメージ量 +10%

original: 자신의 속도가 대상보다 빠르거나 일방 공격을 할 경우, 대상에게 피해량 +20%, 자신의 속도가 대상보다 빠르면, 받는 피해량 -20%
context:
EN :
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +20% more damage against the target; if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, take -20% less damage
JP :
自分の速度が対象より高いか一方攻撃をするとき、対象へダメージ量 +20%, 自分の速度が対象より高ければ、被ダメージ量 -20%
